individual_innovation_indices: Proportion of screened respondents considered to be eligible
Proportion of eligible sample cases that completed the survey
Proportion of survey participants who completed the survey and described a product that met self-report criteria for innovation
Proportion of all screened respondents who described a product that met self-report criteria for household innovation
Proportion of survey participants who completed the survey and who provided description that was validated as an innovation
Proportion of all screened respondents who described an innovation, i.e., the individual innovation incidence rate
